alert.note: Alert for Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:15PM EDT until July 24 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BROOME...SOUTH CENTRAL CORTLAND...NORTHEASTERN TIOGA AND SOUTHEASTERN TOMPKINS COUNTIES... At 415 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Richford, or 12 miles southwest of Marathon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Caroline, Nanticoke, Berkshire, Richford, Newark Valley, Hunts Corners, Jenksville, Center Lisle, Speedville and West Newark. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
